content: {"name": "Greater Spartanburg Ministries", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The food pantry is open Mondays and Thursdays at 9:30 and we accept the first 50 people.  Remember to bring SC ID and social security card.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "680 Asheville Highway", "address_2": null, "city": "Northside", "state_province": "SC", "postal_code": "29303", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 34.9620044, "longitude": -81.9437983}, "phones": [{"number": "(864) 585-9371", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Social Security Card Required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once in 3 months"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
